headline: These 3 Dow Stocks Are Set to Soar in 2025 and Beyond
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) roared higher last year, gaining more than 12%, as some of its biggest growth companies advanced.  Thanks to this ongoing momentum, 2025 may be another good one for the Dow Jones, and three stocks in particular might lead the gains.  Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) joined the Dow Jones last year and went on to post the top performance in the index for the year -- the stock surged 171%.
